/usr/bin/gcc   -g -Wall -O2 -D_REENTRANT -D_GNU_SOURCE -D_LARGEFILE_SOURCE -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64    CMakeFiles/test_libhdfs_read.dir/main/native/libhdfs/test/test_libhdfs_read.c.o  -o test_libhdfs_read -rdynamic target/usr/local/lib/libhdfs.so.0.0.0 /usr/lib/jvm/java-7-openjdk-amd64/jre/lib/amd64/jamvm/libjvm.so -ldl -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/home/liubo/git/hadoop-2.4.0/hadoop-hdfs-project/hadoop-hdfs/target/native/target/usr/local/lib:/usr/lib/jvm/java-7-openjdk-amd64/jre/lib/amd64/jamvm
